How to join?

Buy or sell
on FunPay
1
Join the raffle by clicking «Join».
Buy or sell any service/product worth 100RUB and more to get your first ticket.
You can earn up to 100 tickets.
Got it! I’m off shopping
Earn
tickets
2
Any Lootery ticket has a chance to win. So you might get not one, but several great prizes.
Need more tickets!
Wait for
the Lootery results
3
On January 16, we’ll run the draw and reveal the winning tickets live on Twitch.
During the stream, you can find your tickets by clicking «Check my tickets».
Save the date!
Subscribe to Twitch
Note: sales and purchases are eligible only if made between December 15 and January 15. Trade on FunPay and loot away!

Got some questions left?

Where can I find complete raffle rules and conditions?
Full rules and conditions are right here
I haven’t received any tickets after a purchase/sale. What do I do?
Check if you’ve clicked the «Join» button.
Check your purchase/sale status. Were they made during the raffle period?
If yes, contact our support. The team will help you get the missing tickets.
I trade via «Trades». Does it count?
Yes, sales made via «Trades» are eligible for raffle. The ticket earning rate is the same.
I trade in a different currency. Do my transactions count?
Yes, both sales and purchases made in currencies other than RUB also count. You’ll receive the tickets according to FunPay’s internal rate.
I was trading on FunPay but didn’t know about the raffle. Will I receive some tickets?
Yes, sales/purchases made between December 15 and January 15 are eligible for the raffle. Please, click «Join» on the Lootery’s main page — we’ll send you the tickets.
I participate outside Russia. Can I participate?
Yes. We’ll do our best to deliver your prize, even if you live in West Robloxia.
I’ve won! How do I claim my prize?
Congrats! We’ll contact you via direct messages on FunPay and discuss the delivery details. No need to reach us yourself.
My order was cancelled. Do I keep the tickets for it?
No, tickets earned from a canceled order will be revoked and won’t be eligible for the raffle.
